title: Interpretation of a dream about dry wheat

preview.html: Dream interpretation of dry wheat spikes in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about dry wheat spikes in a dream, and there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams. Interpretation of a dream of dry wheat in a dream Dry ears of corn in a dream may indicate some financial obstacles that the dreamer has suffered from and should That God may seek help from him. If he sees ears of corn, but they wither in a dream, this may indicate his inability to achieve his desires and dreams during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of taking dry ears of wheat indicates an inability to complete the work and projects in this period. Period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dry feed in a dream: Taking dry feed in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. If there is a vision of buying chicken feed in a dream, this may indicate changes Good things will happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, thanks to God. Seeing eating animal fodder in a dream may indicate diseases that may affect the vision, and God knows best. Seeing storing dry fodder in a dream may indicate distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving fodder to the living in a dream. Seeing a dead person giving food to the living in a dream may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer during those days, thanks to God. Seeing taking fodder from the dead in a dream could indicate positive changes that may occur For the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving food from the dead in a dream indicates good changes that will occur to the vision or the ability to satisfy desires and dreams, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving food from the dead in a dream indicates To many good things that the person having the vision can achieve in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of sifting flour in a dream: Seeing a flour sieve in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the person having the vision may gain in his life during this time, thanks to God. In If a person sees sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask God for help. If you see sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate losing money in a bad market during this period, and God knows best. Vision A fine sieve in a dream may indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting barley in a dream Harvesting barley in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time, and God knows best. If One sees that he is collecting barley in a dream, this may indicate the material gains and extensive life that the dreamer may achieve during this period by the grace of God. If one sees harvesting barley in a dream, this may indicate his closeness to the Blessed and Most High God, and avoiding disobedience and sins during this period.

title: Interpretation of anger in a dream for different situations

preview.html: In our article today, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of anger in a dream. Perhaps the biggest motivation for acting irrationally in many situations is his intense anger, and thus many regret their actions that arose from their moments of anger. He knows what his visions mean and whether they lead to good or evil, which is why Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen explained the meanings of these visions, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will present the interpretation of the dream with anger. On various occasions.Interpretation of anger in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing anger in a dreamThe scholar Ibn Sirin says that anger in a dream generally symbolizes the anxiety and fear of the future that the dreamer feels.Screaming in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to overcome his problems, which will improve his condition. Whether physical or psychological, the dream is good news that there are positive changes in his life. One of the most promising visions is to dream that you are angry with someone, because it is a sign of the collapse of the dreamer’s problems with others, and a lot of good will come to him. One of the warning dreams is to see family anger It is a harbinger of material losses that lead to the accumulation of debts. Whoever sees in a dream that he is angry and arguing, his dreams indicate that he feels angry in reality, so the vision here is an embodiment of his position in reality. Interpretation of anger in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Researcher Abdel-Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing anger in a dream An unpleasant interpretation, because it means that the dreamer will lose someone he loves. A dream of anger symbolizes the bad psychological state of the dreamer due to his suffering from many problems in his life. If one dreams of being angry and crying, this means that God Almighty will grant him long life, health and well-being. One of the most promising dreams Dreaming of anger and tears, because it indicates saving the dreamer from his problems and worries and healing him if he is sick. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing anger in a dream. Ibn Shaheen narrated that anger in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face a big problem. Whoever dreams that he is angry with his friend, the dream indicates that he will enter In a business project with this friend, he achieves material gains. Dreaming of an angry look at him is a sign that the dreamer will face a crisis that he will not be able to overcome easily. If a person sees in his dream that he is angry and shouts loudly, this means that he is suffering from sadness, severe anxiety, and problems. In fact.Interpretation of a dream about anger for single people: One of the promising visions for a single woman is her dream of anger and crying, because it is a sign that God will satisfy her desires and dreams and grant her success in her life.Seeing an angry look in a single woman’s dream means that the woman is suffering from feelings of disappointment, despair, anxiety, and fear in her life. If an unmarried woman dreams that her fiancé is angry with her, the dream indicates that she will marry him. As for seeing the mother’s anger in an unmarried girl’s dream, this indicates that the dreamer is committing many bad deeds. The vision here is a message to her that she needs to stop doing this. Interpretation of seeing anger in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is angry with her father, this means that there will be many problems between her and her husband. Visions

Visions

title: Interpretation of a black scorpion in a dream: Seeing a black scorpion in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a black scorpion, for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for divorced women, for men, whether the black scorpion was killed, it stung me at home, in the room and in the bed, by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and not only. Interpretation of the black scorpion in a dream. The scorpion in a dream symbolizes the enemy, evil, or danger, The black scorpion is an expressive and powerful symbol, and its appearance in visions reflects the presence of something worthy of review by the viewer, whether in feelings, ideas, practice, or social life. Interpretation of a black scorpion sting in a dream: A black scorpion sting in a dream indicates harm that may befall the viewer from a malicious person. It also expresses a difficult situation that the viewer may face financially. It can also express gossip, offensive words, or bad intentions that may be harbored by a relative or friend. Interpretation of killing a black scorpion in a dream: Kill a black scorpion in a dream if you see a black scorpion trying to attack or surprise you, but in return you improve your behavior with it by killing it, stomping on it, or cutting off its stinger. In waking life you will do better. A dangerous or difficult matter, or you will teach the bad person a difficult lesson, and the dream expresses a strong and strict personality in the face of difficult situations and opponents. Interpretation of a black scorpion in the house in a dream. Seeing a black scorpion in the house is a dangerous man and yellow is a bad woman. If you see a black scorpion in your home, this indicates the presence A nearby man wants evil, is planning evil, or is preparing something that will harm God. What is good in this dream is that you see the owner getting rid of the scorpion or expelling it. Interpretation of black scorpion venom in a dream. The black scorpion’s venom in the dream is in a thorn, and the man’s venom is in his tongue, and the venom in dreams symbolizes Bad talk, false news, and gossip. Whoever sees a poisoned scorpion in a cup or sees it as if he is drinking it or drinking it, this is his interpretation of moral harm to the fortuneteller. Also, being branded by a black scorpion is money with dire consequences, or money spent in rebellion, or whose source is forbidden, such as forbidden trade or smuggling. It is said that it is a crime or a malicious act. Interpretation of the black scorpion in a dream for a married woman. The black scorpion in a dream for a married woman indicates the presence of family disputes that can have very negative effects, and its appearance in the dream expresses her deep fears for a person or event that she fears will happen, such as need or illness. . Or separation. Interpretation of a black scorpion in a dream for a single woman. Black scorpion. The dream of a black scorpion in a dream of an unmarried woman is associated with an unstable emotional life due to anxiety, doubt and lack of trust in the partner. Interpretation of a black scorpion in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing a black scorpion in our dreams as evil and controversy that The dreamer will fall into it in public life, and it indicates bad news that he will hear in the next stage of his life, and the dreamer must turn to God Almighty. As soon as he wakes up. Seeing a black scorpion coming out of any area of ​​the body is evidence that the area contains the evil that the dreamer brings to life. Seeing a black scorpion coming out of the mouth in a dream is evidence that the sayings and...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a flood in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: A flood in a dream. A flood is one of the things that has many different interpretations. This is due to the size of the flood, as well as the extent of the destruction it causes, the status of the fortuneteller with the flood, and other important matters that we have explained in it. This article is about men, women, singles, and others, and in the following paragraphs we explain all the other topics that help in knowing the interpretations of your dream... so follow us. Torrent in a dream. Seeing a torrent in a dream means that there are some difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life. If the dreamer sees in the dream the torrent heading towards a cliff Large, it interprets that the dreamer will survive the crises he faces. When one sees in a dream a torrent that has reached agricultural land and completely submerged it, this means that there are some bad things that the dreamer will face and he will hear bad news, and God knows best. The presence of a torrent of blood in the dream symbolizes Sins and evils committed by the dreamer and he must repent and return to the straight path. When the dreamer sees that there is a large flood in the unexpected summer seasons, this means that there is a jealous eye in his life that does not wish him well. Flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Flood in a dream, according to what was narrated Imam Ibn Sirin, indicates the presence of problems that the dreamer is going through. When he sees in a dream that a strong flood is coming to him, this means that unpleasant news will come to him and he must prepare for the crisis period to pass, but he will pass it well by God’s command. In the event that the dreamer sees A torrent is sweeping the country, then this is a sign of the presence of an epidemic and diseases that will appear in his city recently. If the torrent submerges homes in a person’s dream, this indicates that he has severed ties of kinship, and there are major disputes in his house. When someone sees that he is drinking from the stream, this symbolizes that he is committing sins. Great, God forbid, and he must believe in repentance and return to God and invite him to forgive his sins. The torrent in Nabulsi’s dream. If a poor person sees a stream of clean water coming and he is not afraid, this indicates that his financial condition will change a lot and he will be happier than before. When he sees A sick person has a flood in his dream and it passes in front of him, this means that he will get rid of fatigue and improve his health. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a flood and he is about to start a new matter, this indicates that the dreamer should be more careful. What is the interpretation of a flood in a dream for a single woman The occurrence of a flood in a person’s dream is not a promising dream, but there are some bad signs in it. If a girl sees in a dream that a flood is approaching her, this is a sign that there are some problems that she faces and that it will be difficult to solve them on her own. When an unmarried woman sees a flood Big in her dream, this means that she made some bad decisions that exposed her to losses. The presence of a clean stream in a girl’s dream indicates that there will be good for her in the coming period, and God knows best. Drowning in the torrent of singles indicates the nearness of her marriage and she will be very happy with it. Survival of A torrent in a dream for a single woman. Surviving a torrent of consolation symbolizes that there are some problems that you face, but the Lord will forgive.

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Children in a person’s life are considered one of the most beautiful things that give couples a strong and long bond over time. Many couples love to have many children and some wait to see their children after God permits it. Seeing children in a dream happens to many people. Many people have their love for children, and this thing gives happiness and a lot of goodness to the seer among the children. In this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a little girl is often a sign of goodness and joy. . And if she is smiling and beautiful. But an ugly or angry child does not mean good. It is a sign of the many problems and troubles that the fortuneteller will face in reality, God forbid. A child crying in a dream is a sign of the misfortune of the death of a person dear to the heart of the dreamer, God forbid. It also indicates bad news that the dreamer will be exposed to in his life, and he must be patient and accountable before God to look into his matter. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream Interpretation by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin and believes that a girl in a dream is one of the symbols that heralds goodness and happiness to the dreamer in life. If she is in good health and has a good appearance. As for a weak and weak child, it is a sign of the difficulties that the dreamer will face, which he does not know how he will survive. If the girl is ugly or has an inappropriate appearance, then seeing her portends problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face. Interpretation of seeing a girl In a dream for a single woman: Seeing a young girl in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of the good and great happiness that she will receive, if the child smiles happily and has a well-groomed appearance. But if she is ugly, wears dirty clothes, or cries, these are bad signs that indicate that single people will face many problems. And difficulties in life. Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream for a married woman: A beautiful little girl in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the happiness that she will have soon, and it can be a sign of a lot of food and happy news that she will hear. In some cases, seeing a beautiful baby girl in a dream is good news. For pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. But if she is ugly or cries in the dream, this is one of the signs that does not lead to good. It is a sign of the presence of many disagreements and problems between the dreamer and her husband, and she must be patient in resolving them. they. With them. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream for a pregnant woman: It is known that the dream is always the opposite of reality, so if a pregnant woman finds a beautiful child in her dream, then her dream is a sign of the birth of a boy, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. In some cases, seeing a beautiful girl in a dream is a sign For ease, ease, and getting rid of the problems of pregnancy and ease of childbirth, God willing. As for an ugly girl, or one with poor clothes, it is a sign of the difficulties that a pregnant woman may face in pregnancy or childbirth, God forbid.

As for an ugly girl, or one with poor clothes, it is a sign of the difficulties that a pregnant woman may face in pregnancy or childbirth, God forbid.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gift for a deceased person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gift for a deceased person in a dream. Some people may want to know the dream interpretation of a deceased person’s gift in a dream. Among the dreams that many wanted to know is its interpretation, so we can learn about its interpretation by some diligent interpreters, and the reader should know that it is the jurisprudence of scholars. The site is not in the interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a gift to the deceased in a dream Giving a gift to the deceased in a dream may indicate changes that occur to the dreamer in his life during those days. Everyone who dreams that the deceased gives him a gift in a dream may indicate Loss or damage that the dreamer may be exposed to in his life, and God knows best. In the case of a vision that gives the deceased a gift and the deceased rejects it in the dream, this may indicate a large number of sins so that the dreamer may ask forgiveness and pray for mercy over him. A dream about giving food to the dead in a dream may indicate some crises The materialism that the dreamer may face in his life and he must seek God’s help. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a makeup box in a dream Giving a makeup box as a gift in a dream may indicate the great bond that exists between that person during those days. If a girl sees that her fiancé gave her a makeup box in a dream, This may indicate his intense love for her, and praise be to God. If a girl sees that she received a box of makeup as a gift in a dream, this may indicate a lot of goodness for her in the coming days, and God knows best. Dreaming of receiving a box of makeup as a gift in a dream may indicate changes. Positive things will happen to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a gift to my friend in a dream: Giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate the closeness that exists between you during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he gave a gift to his friend may indicate the good luck he enjoys. The person during those days, thanks to God. Dreaming of giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to him during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for a gift of the sweetness of birth in a dream. Receiving the sweetness of the Prophet’s birth as a gift in a dream may be good news for visions during this time If one sees that he received birthday candy as a gift in a dream, this may indicate the happiness that will come to him in those days, thanks to God. Dreaming of a gift of birthday sweets in a dream may indicate the broadest lifestyle that the person with the vision can achieve in his life during these times. Period. It is possible that the vision of receiving the sweetness of Christmas as a gift indicates the happiness and joys that come to the dreamer’s life at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about the gift of shoes in a dream: Giving shoes in a dream can indicate good material changes that occur to the dreamer in his life during this period. If you see shoes as a gift in a dream, this may indicate a great source of livelihood and abundant money that comes to insight during this time, thanks to God. And whoever sees in his dream that he has received shoes as a gift, it may indicate his travels or good events that will come to him in that time. Period, and God knows best. If he sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying on the phone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of crying on the phone in a dream. We will learn in the following lines the interpretation of a dream of crying on the phone in a dream and whether it is good or bad according to the interpretations of scholars..Interpretation of a dream of crying on the phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of crying on the phone in a dream could be a sign of distress, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself crying, this may lead to worries, and God knows best. If a married man sees himself crying in a dream, this may be a sign of negative feelings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of hearing good news on the phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing happy news on the phone in a dream could be An indication of changes, and God knows the unseen. When he sees hearing good news on the phone, this can lead to enjoying his health. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees hearing good news in the dream, it may be a sign of good things. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of receiving the phone of someone I know in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of receiving Phone of someone I know in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this, except that seeing a phone can indicate power and high status, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a phone, this may be a sign of good things. When she sees a white phone, this indicates good news and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my husband talking to me on Telephone in a dream - Interpretation of a dream about my husband talking to me on the phone in a dream. The husband’s call could be a sign of news. If a married woman sees her husband calling, this foretells her good news that may be a sign of positive changes, and God knows best. When you see a married woman calling her husband, and there is a dispute between them, it may be There is reconciliation, and God knows the unseen. Communication can also appear, and that was clear in friendship, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams for someone holding my phone in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for someone holding my phone in a dream. We did not find any specific concepts to consider this. However, seeing yourself talking on the phone and not remembering the details of the call can lead to sadness, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl talking on the phone, this can lead to good news, and God knows the unseen, while the call may transmit Telephones are bad news, for God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my phone ringing in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my phone rings in a dream could be a sign of nourishment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a phone ringing it can lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If a deer sees the sound of rain and lightning in a dream, it may be a sign. Good changes, and God knows best. In the event that the phone collides with the wind, it may be travel, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a blue phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a blue phone in a dream. Buying a new blue phone could indicate something that will disrupt the life of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see a black phone, it could That it leads to victory, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a girl buying a black phone, this may indicate victory, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen buying a red phone, this may lead to good news, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dirty carpet according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Carpet is a type of furniture placed on the floor of homes and because there are many types of carpet, the interpretations of seeing carpet in a dream are also multiple. Therefore, you are presented with a different website. In this article, the interpretation of a dream about a dirty carpet in a dream, by Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, with an explanation of the different interpretations of this dream according to the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a dirty carpet in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of a dream about a carpet in a dream that it is an undesirable vision. Which indicates some problems that the dreamer faces in his life, and the dream indicates turbulent conditions. Dreaming of a dirty carpet in a dream indicates bad morals, the priest’s monitoring of one’s desires, and lack of interest in acts of obedience and implementing what the Sharia has commanded. The dirty carpet that surrounds a man From every side it indicates that he is surrounded by false company that leads him to the path of evil. Therefore, the monarch must choose someone who is honest among the people. But if the carpet that a person sees in a dream is clean, then the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer has a good reputation among the people and desires to perform obligatory duties without negligence. A clean carpet in a dream is a sign of good Character and upright character. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about giving a dead person a blanket by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about dirty carpets in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees dirty carpets in her dream, then this dream is a sign of the many psychological pressures that surround her from all sides due to Feeling inferior and not achieving satisfactory success. Dreaming of dirty carpets in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate that she is in a relationship with a young man and must break off her relationship with this young man immediately so that her reputation among people does not become bad. When an unmarried girl sits on a dirty carpet in a dream, The meaning of this dream is that she has become accustomed to a life of sin and has completely moved away from obedience. If an unmarried girl washes dirty carpets in her sleep without feeling tired or exhausted, then this is a blessed sign of the end of the sin of her life and the entry of a new era of purity and chastity. Clean carpets in the girl’s dream indicate An unmarried woman indicates the good that will surround all aspects of her life. Psychologists believe that when an unmarried girl sees a dirty carpet in her dream, this is evidence of her psychological disorder and her feeling of randomness in her life and the instability of her affairs. The dirt that comes out of the carpet in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the end of Problems and a peaceful way out of the crises that besieged the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a dirty carpet in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the carpet so full of dirt and dust that the features of the carpet fade, this is an indication of the many differences between her and her husband, to the point that all feelings between them have completely disappeared and both of them. The parties live in a state of unhappiness and without remembering anything positive about their relationship. Washing dirty carpets by a married woman shows her ability to overcome the crises she is going through and her desire to maintain family ties.

title: Interpretation of the old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin about good and evil

preview.html: Through this article you can see the interpretation of the old man in a dream in detail. There are many symbols that the dreamer sees in his dream and he believes that they are just dreams, that is, they are not a real vision in the beginning of the place, and among these symbols they see familiar people, whether they are relatives or friends, But sometimes the dreamer sees unknown people, whether they are children, young people, or adults, and this vision carries many different interpretations that arouse the dreamer's curiosity to know its meanings. This dream portends something unpleasant; We will answer this in an encyclopedia. The meaning of an old man in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing an old man in a dream who appears to be pious indicates the dreamer’s good condition, his pursuit of jihad, and his commitment to obeying God. As for seeing an old Christian in a dream, this expresses the great differences that exist between the dreamer. And his enemies in reality. For the dreamer who dreams of an old Jewish man in a dream, this vision indicates a person who carries hatred and hatred towards the dreamer and seeks to harm him. When you dream of seeing an old man in good health, this also reflects the dreamer’s good health in reality. As for the vision of eating food With an old man in a dream, this vision indicates kindness and abundance of money. If the dreamer dreams that he is arguing with an old man, this indicates that there will be disagreements with family or friends. Seeing an unfaithful old man in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in his life. The dreamer seeks to harm him. When the dreamer sees an old man as a manager in his work, this indicates the benefit that the dreamer derives from an old man in reality. If the old man that the dreamer saw in the dream looks sick, this indicates the poor health condition that the dreamer suffers from. When he sees The dreamer in a dream says that he has turned into an old man, then this expresses the character of the dreamer who is pleased with his prudence and is famous for his abundant knowledge. Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin showed in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing an old man in a dream is a good vision for the dreamer and reflects a state of peace Psychological and the tranquility that he enjoys in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is arguing with an old man in a dream, this indicates the crises that the dreamer is going through with people close to him. But when the fortuneteller dreams of a smiling old man in a dream, this indicates kindness and an increase in money. But when you see an old man with a frowning face, this indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period during which the problems that cause him stress and distress increase. When the dreamer sees an old man giving him something, whether it is food, clothes, or anything else, this is a welcome sign that expresses achievements. And excellence in professional life. Interpretation of a dream about an old man for a man: If a man dreams that he is eating with an old man in a dream, then this vision indicates kindness and nourishment for him. As for seeing an old man whom the dreamer knows in a dream, it is a dream promising achievements on the ground. If the dreamer sees that he has Getting old in a dream

title: Interpretation of removing thorns in a dream: seeing thorns in a dream

preview.html: Removing the thorn from the hand, from the toe, and the mouth, removing the finger from the body, and the thorn from the rose and cactus in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A single, married, and pregnant woman mentioned. Interpretation of thorns in a dream: Dreaming of someone with thorns is a sign of an ignorant or fanatical person, and thorns in a dream can be a sign of temptation. For harm to happen to him in his life, and seeing a plant or tree with thorns in a dream indicates a man who is difficult to describe and ten. Seeing thorns in one dream. If an unmarried girl or woman sees thorns in a dream, as if she sees herself walking on a path full of thorns, this indicates obstacles, difficulties, and challenges that You will face it in the future. Seeing an unmarried woman as if a thorn had pierced her shoe or feet warns her that she is on the wrong path, or warns her that she knows a man who can harm her, and therefore she must be careful. And the unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she Being cut by a thorn that entered her body or clothes, this vision indicates the imminent disappearance of problems and difficulties and the emergence of ease, God willing. Seeing thorns in a married woman’s dream: It is common for a married woman to see in her dream as if she is walking in a field full of thorns, which indicates that she is suffering from ongoing psychological problems. It is abhorrent to see planting thorns in a married woman’s dream, and it is also abhorrent to harvest thorns, because it indicates family and marital disputes and problems, God forbid. Seeing thorns in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman seeing herself getting rid of thorns in her dream, this indicates The end of the pain and problems of pregnancy, and her safety and the safety of her newborn, God willing. Seeing thorns in a man’s dream. As for a man who sees thorns in his dream, this indicates psychological problems and disorders that may be due to the family or work, and seeing a man as if he had been stabbed with a thorn in his hand or finger indicates the presence of Financial problems and debt. Seeing a person as if his entire body is pierced with thorns, this means the aggravation and multiplication of problems, judgments, transgressions and sins. His life and steps are good, and thorns in a dream may indicate a feeling of sadness or an awakening of consciousness. Seeing thorns removed from the body in a dream. Seeing thorns removed from the body in a dream indicates renunciation of the dreamer’s sins, and seeing thorns removed from the leg and foot indicates correcting the dreamer’s path in life. And avoid walking in it. Mazes and inappropriate roads. And matter, removing thorns from the tongue and mouth indicates abandoning enmity, grudges and grudges.Interpretation of seeing thorns - YouTubeFork - YouTube
